sendButton.label: Send
sendButton.recipientsRequired: At least one recipient is required
sendButton.sendLaterInPast: The selected time is in the past

openInBrowser.encryptedLabel: Open in Outlook to view attachments of encrypted or signed mails
openInBrowser.encryptedExplanation: This email is signed or encrypted. Due to technical limitations only recipients can see the attachments directly in Outlook.

errorMessages.createDraftMessage: This feature requires an Exchange Online mailbox. If you are in a hybrid environment make sure your mailbox was already migrated to Exchange Online
errorMessages.noAnswersMessage: Sending this email will probably work if you have "Send As" or "Send on behalf of" permissions to {{mailbox}}, but the answers will not be visible in this issue as you do not have Full Access permissions to {{mailbox}}

comment.subject: Subject:
comment.imageRemoved: [Image Removed - Open the email to see this image]
comment.emailAddedPhrase: An email has been sent for this issue:
comment.tooLongMessage: [The body of the email is too long to be included in the comment. It was removed from the comment intentionally]

officeLoginScreen.heading: Welcome to {{ appName }}
officeLoginScreen.description: Looks like you're using the app for the first time. Please log in with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!

sendLater.sectionTitle: Choose a time for the email to be sent
sendLater.description: You can decide to send the email at a later time. It will be saved as a draft and sent at the specified time automatically by Outlook.
sendLater.triggerTooltip: Choose a time for the email to be sent

sharing.privateDescription: Only I can see this conversation
sharing.azureTenantDescription: Every {{user}} in my organization can see this conversation
sharing.atlassianCloudDescription: Every {{user}} with access to this issue can see this conversation
sharing.sectionTitle: Choose who should be able to see this conversation
sharing.triggerTooltip: Choose who should be able to see this conversation

commentVisibility.choose: Choose if a comment should be added to the issue
commentVisibility.tooltipExplanation: Choose if a comment should be added

addAsParticipants.noneDescription: No additional request participants will be added.
addAsParticipants.existingOnlyDescription: Only already existing users and customer users will be added.
addAsParticipants.createOnDemandDescription: Add existing users and create customer users if necessary.
addAsParticipants.sectionTitle: Choose if "To" and "Cc" recipients should be added as request participants
addAsParticipants.tooltipExplanation: Choose if recipients should be added as participants
